Title: Antarctica
Writer: Robia Rashid (creator), Robia Rashid, Ava Tramer (story editor)
Actors: Jennifer Jason Leigh, Michael Rapport, Brigette Lundy-Paine, Amy Okuda
Plot: Interested in having a girlfriend, Sam researches dating advice and puts it to the test. Meanwhile, his overprotective mom Elsa must learn to let go.
